description: Requirement Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC), Summerland Research and Development Centre (SuRDC), Summerland, BC., require the supply and delivery of one Automated liquid handler and accessories. The automated liquid handler will be used in the Tree Fruit Genomics Program at SuRDC, for molecular biology research. It will automate repetitive laboratory tasks such as sample preparation, tube to plate transfer, plate normalizations and genomic assays for downstream applications including but not limited to PCR, qPCR and low-throughput NGS library preparations.

* The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC), Summerland Research and Development Centre (SuRDC), Summerland, BC, requires the supply and delivery of one Automated Liquid Handler and Accessories.
